𒈛 ≈ 𒋰𒁹𒁹𒁹𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒈦𒁹𒁹𒁹 𒈛 ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒌋 ≈ 𒂍 ≈ 𒋰𒁹𒁹𒁹𒁹 ≈ 𒋰𒐈 ≈ 𒆤

𒈛 luhᵇ ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒌋 ≈ 𒑊𒐈 LIB 𒈜 𒈛 luḫ ≈ 𒋰𒐈𒌋 ≈ 𒑊𒐈 LUG 𒈜

𒈛 laḫ₃ luḫ luh 𒇻𒄴 lu-uh PIE *lewh₃ λούω loúō "wash" 𒈛 laḫ₃ luḫ < ruḫ riḫ rein 𒇳 LA₂ ⇔ 𒈛 LUH gunu
𒈛 luh Lines ⇔ riḫ Reihen / ruḫ rows / harrows / Furchen 𒈛 naḫ •net ⇔ luḫ •Loch néto neto netto net νίπτω níptō نَظِيف naẓīf نضيف naḍīf נָקִי nakí naked "clean" NL switch!
𒈛 ḪULUḪᵒⁿ "clean" <> sukkal

𒈛 laḫ₃ <> lyse lavandar launder lauge libation limpio "clean" 𒈛 •(s)kalavḫ₃ கழுவு kaḻuvuⁿ clean 𒈛 sukal 𒋢𒆗𒈝 su-kal-lum "clean, wash" 𒈛 sukal ≈ 𒈪𒋢𒌑 mi-su-u₂ᵐ mõskma մաքուր makʿur mazgāt mȉti "wash" @ mwater 𒈛 sukal ≈ силки silki غَسَلَ ḡasala "wash" 𒈛 sukal clean <> 𒈛 subur₂ 𒋚 SUBUR •säuber spăla, spel≈spühlen 𐌸𐍅𐌰𐌷𐌰𐌽 "wash" <> সাফ śaph soap

𒈛 sukkal wash ↔ vesir "secretary, civil servant"

𒈛 luḫ ≈ leo in 𓃭 ruḫ 𒈛 sukal 𒋢𒆗 su-kal 𒋢𒊌𒆗𒈝 su-uk-kal-lum 𒈤 SUKKAL MAḪ 𓎟 maḫa "exhalted vizier" 𒈛 sukal 𒉺𒋛𒋢 pa-si-su "priest" Durchlaucht <> rex

𒈛 subur₂ 𒋚 SUBUR ? •säuber clean purification priest?

𒈛𒋢 riḫ-su "rising, rush" 𒈛𒋢 flood(ing)

𒈛𒋢 riḫ-su <> 𐎗𐎈𐎕 rḥṣ רָחַץ rakháts "wash" (rags)

•GVR Graus

𒅆 ҡурҡыу qurqïw “fear”
𒁍𒈛𒌅 pu-luḫ-tu •Flucht < •Furcht
𒁍𒈛𒌅 pu-ruḫ-tu •Furcht
𒁍𒈛𒌅 fear (someness) ⇔ beast 𒁍𒇻 •puᵏ-ru

𒁍𒈛𒋫 𒊏𒈬 pu-luḫ-ta ra-mu •Flucht machen 𒁍𒈛𒋫 𒊏𒈬 to inspire fear •Furcht machen

𒀀𒈛𒄷 a-raḫ-ḫu 𒀀𒈛𒄷 granary, storehouse

𒉿𒈛𒄷 ya-raḫ-ḫu rye Roggen 𒉿𒈛𒄷 a kind of good quality grain

𒀊𒈛𒌅 ap-luḫ-tu 𒀊𒈛𒌅 armor

𒈛𒁀𒇻 naḫ'ba-lu 𒈛-Falle 𒈛𒁀𒇻 trap

𒈛𒁀𒈝 naḫ-ba-lum 𒈛-Falle 𒈛𒁀𒈝 trap

𒈛𒁀𒌅 naḫ-ba-tu <> portemonnaie ? 𒈛𒁀𒌅 a leather or reed carrying-case

𒆷𒄩𒈛𒋗 la-ḫa-ruḫ-šu 𒆷𒄩𒈛𒋗 quiver (on chariot)

𒌋𒈛𒄷 u-ruḫ-ḫu 𒌋𒈛𒄷 scepter, hair (of head) <> raš

𒌨𒈛𒌅 taš-riḫ-tu 𒌨𒈛𒌅 boastfulness, glorification

𒈛𒈤 SUKKAL MAḪ 𓃭𓎟 maḫa 𒈛𒈤 exhalted vizier

𒈛𒋗 luḫ-šu 𒈛𒋗 a temple functionary

𒆠𒊩𒈛𒄷 ki-sal-luḫ-ḫu 𒆠𒊩𒈛𒄷 courtyard sweeper

𒆠𒊓𒈛𒄷 ki-sa-luḫ-ḫu <<<< 𒆠𒊓𒈛𒄷 courtyard sweeper <> 𒀀𒈛𒄷 a-raḫ-ḫu granary, storehouse\

𒈠𒈛𒌅 ma-naḫ-tu µnacht umnächtigung 𒈠𒈛𒌅 toil, work => 𒈠𒈛𒌅 ma-naḫ-tu µnacht umnächtigung 𒈠𒈛𒌅 fatigue, weariness
